definition: Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
ruins of Luntai city, archaeological site in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
Fenghuang Ancient Town, in Fenghuang County, Xiangxi Prefecture, Hunan, added to the UNESCO World Heritage Tentative List in 2008 in the Cultural category

sentences.english: Xi'an City Wall dates back to the Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 西安古城牆始建於明朝。

sentences.english: The Square Street at the Center of the Ancient Town is a typical example of ancient streets in Lijiang.
sentences.chinese: 位於古城中心的四方街是麗江古街的代表。

sentences.english: Cartagena is a beautiful old walled city.
sentences.chinese: 卡塔赫納是一個有城牆圍繞的美麗古城。

sentences.english: We will visit the remains of an old castle tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天他將參觀那個古城堡遺址。

sentences.english: Tomorrow,  I look for forward to seeing the Terra Cotta Warriors and the Old City walls.
sentences.chinese: 我期待着明天參觀兵馬俑和古城牆。

sentences.english: After about two hours, we went back to the Old City.
sentences.chinese: 在拉市海逗留了大概2個小時，又坐車返回麗江古城。

sentences.english: There is an ancient town called Gaozhou there.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏有一座高州古城。

sentences.english: Xi'an is a world-famous city for her ancient culture.
sentences.chinese: 西安是一座舉世聞名的文化古城。

sentences.english: Chaoyang city's urban form is divided into outer city and inner city.
sentences.chinese: 朝陽古城的城市形態主要分爲外城和內城。

sentences.english: Professor Jacque G. has been excavating in and around the ancient city for five years.
sentences.chinese: 教授5年來一直在挖掘研究這座古城。

sentences.english: The Town Council spent a lot of money in preserving the old castle and other places of interest.
sentences.chinese: 市委員會花了不少錢來保護那座古城堡和其他名勝。

sentences.english: The Dayan Old Town is a World Historical and Cultural City.
sentences.chinese: 麗江大研古城是世界歷史文化名城。

sentences.english: A:Sam,Mr.Chen has recently bought a flat in Tai Koo Shing.
sentences.chinese: 森，陳先生最近買了太古城一個住宅物業。

sentences.english: At number one is Teotihuacán located on the bay of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 位列第一的是出於墨西哥灣的特奧蒂瓦坎古城。

sentences.english: The 16th century, the city is also sacrifice in Spain early 1200s artillery.
sentences.chinese: 16世紀，這座古城也是犧牲在西班牙的火炮鐵蹄下。

sentences.english: When I walked around the city, I saw streets just as they had been.
sentences.chinese: 走在古城中，我看到原樣保存下來的街道。

definition: places of historic interest/historical sites/CL:個|个[ge4]
old town/old district of a city
Lao Cai, Vietnam/Laokai or Laukkai, Burma (Myanmar)
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3
